description: Despite its bright, elegant and airy feel, the panoramic dining room at this restaurant takes second place to the delightful, romantic terrace which boasts splendid views of the sea, the port and the hills around Positano. Here, a new chef with an impressive CV delights guests (and non-residents) at the charming Le Agavi hotel with his selection of tasting menus. Top-quality ingredients take centre stage, some sourced from his own organic kitchen garden, as well as traditional dishes to which he adds modern and updated twists.
